title: Enlightened Nights
description: As two women try to rebuild fractured lives on the foundation of love, another returns to a world she once bestrode. Winning her freedom, she had lost a future and now she must forge herself afresh.But in a far off country a powerful threat is rising, a sister twisted with hatred and focussed squarely on revenge. Who is on their side, who is not? Two are taken; another is compelled to return to a country of which she has a turbulent mix of memories of hurt, horror, love and loss.And their little cat? She has her own particular revenge to takeâ€¦Themes - F/F, M/F, Dark, Abduction, Revenge, Domination, Forced Submission.
author: H.A. Kotys
